speaker: Lizelle and Beatrice
text: Give yourself to desire. Lust for temptation. Yearn for what was once unattainable. Free yourself from the boundaries of life.

speaker: Lizelle and Beatrice
text: Right and wrong shall render themselves meaningless in our new haven. All that ails thee shall be restored. Life will become pure and eternal bliss!

speaker: Dizzy
text: You can’t do this! And what does this even have to do with Cosmic Express?!

speaker: Terra
text: Yeah... a train as a choice for eternal bliss is pretty questionable.

speaker: Beatrice
text: We LOVE them! This is the perfect one for our new haven!

speaker: Lizelle
text: It all started 12 years, 2 months, 7 days, 3 hours, 27 minutes ago... On this exact train.

speaker: Beatrice
text: I remember like it was yesterday. That fateful encounter...

speaker: Lizelle
text: You stumbled into the seat next to me, and I knew from the moment we locked eyes. It was destiny.

speaker: Beatrice
text: That's why we will stop at nothing to make our dreams come true!

speaker: Ashe
text: Tch, whatever... Let’s just get this over with already.

speaker: Terra
text: But I still have SO many questions about the technological side of actualizing desires into tangible matter-

speaker: Lizelle
text: The curtains rise on the final act!

speaker: Beatrice
text: This is where your hero tale comes to an end!
